articles.title: The cat is out of the bag - Kelly Rowland partners up with big brand in SA - Sunday World
articles.description: American singer and songwriter Kelly Rowland has kept everyone guessing why she is here in South Africa. This week she confirmed on Twitter
articles.content: American singer and songwriter Kelly Rowland has kept everyone guessing why she is here in South Africa. This week she confirmed on Twitter that she is in South Africa, and by the look of things on h… [+942 chars]
